user.title: Hisense TV
user.description: Enter the IP address of your Hisense TV.

certs.title: SSL Certificates
certs.description:
The TV requires client certificates for mTLS authentication. Place the certificate files in `{cert_dir}/` or specify custom paths below.

Required files: `{cert_file}` and `{key_file}`

confirm.title: Confirm Hisense TV
confirm.description: Do you want to set up {name} ({host})?

pair.title: Pair with TV
pair.description: A PIN code should appear on your TV ({name} at {host}). Enter the PIN below.

reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate Hisense TV
reauth_confirm.description: The TV at {host} requires reauthentication. A new PIN will be displayed on the TV.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to TV. Make sure the TV is on and reachable.
error.certs_not_found: Certificate files not found. Please check the paths and ensure the files exist.
error.invalid_pin: Invalid PIN. Please check the PIN on your TV and try again.
error.auth_verify_failed: Authentication succeeded but could not verify. Please try again.

abort.no_host: Could not determine TV host address.
abort.tv_not_responding: TV is not responding. Make sure it is powered on and connected to the network.
abort.not_hisense_tv: Device is not a Hisense/Vidaa TV.

init.title: Hisense TV Options
init.description: Configure options for your Hisense TV.

data_description.scan_interval: How often to poll the TV for state updates (in seconds).
data_description.wol_mac: MAC address to use for Wake-on-LAN. Leave empty to use the default.

command_failed.message: Failed to send command to TV: {error}

cannot_connect.message: Cannot connect to {host}. Ensure the TV is on and reachable.

authentication_failed.message: Authentication failed. Please re-pair with the TV.

certificate_missing.title: SSL Certificates Missing

confirm.title: Add SSL Certificates
confirm.description:
The Hisense TV integration requires SSL certificates for authentication.

Please place the following files in `{cert_dir}/`:
- `{cert_file}`
- `{key_file}`

These can be extracted from the Vidaa APK. Click Submit after adding the files.

abort.certificates_still_missing: Certificates are still missing. Please add the required files.

certificate_missing.description: SSL certificates are missing from `{cert_dir}/`. The integration cannot connect to the TV without these files.

connection_failed.title: TV Connection Failed

init.title: Reconnect to TV
init.description:
The connection to your Hisense TV at {host} has failed.

Please ensure:
1. The TV is powered on
2. The TV is connected to the network
3. No firewall is blocking port 36669

Click Submit to acknowledge and retry.

connection_failed.description: Cannot connect to TV at {host}. The TV may be off or unreachable.

send_key.name: Send Key
send_key.description: Send a remote key press to the TV.

key.name: Key
key.description: The key to send (e.g., KEY_POWER, KEY_UP, KEY_OK)

launch_app.name: Launch App
launch_app.description: Launch an application on the TV.

app.name: App
app.description: The app to launch (e.g., netflix, youtube, amazon)
